divs: Sighting Detailsi work 3rd shift steped outside caught them out corner of my eye three small triangle shaped craft flying app. 500 ft low close to me flying in v formation not fast at all woldnt of thought much of it but they were so low about automobile size no sound i just watched them fly out of sight
Summary: small triangle shape aircraft low no sound
